description: Jesse Morton, a former Al Qaeda recruiter who became an informer, knew the London attacker Khuram Shazad Butt and flagged him to the F.B.I. in a report in 2015.
title: Meet the Former Extremist Who Flagged a London Attacker in 2015
title_page: Meet the Former Extremist Who Flagged a London Attacker in 2015 - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Jesse Morton, a former Al Qaeda recruiter who became an informer, knew the London attacker Khuram Shazad Butt and flagged him to the F.B.I. in a report in 2015.
